channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Multi-page Toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Multi-page Toolkit

item.title: CVE-2022-1818|2024-08-03T00:17:00.207Z -- unknown -- multi-page%20toolkit
item.description: The Multi-page Toolkit WordPress plugin through 2.6 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping as well
